summary: This mod adds a craft-able Shield to your adventures. The design as some may recognise is from the genius McFarlane, creator of Spawn.
descriptionHtml:
~~~This Shield is craftable under Hide class from any forge~~~
This mod adds a craft-able Shield to your adventures. The design as some may recognise is from the genius McFarlane, creator of Spawn. This Shield is based off that used by \'Bluetooth\' the Viking from the Spawn Dark Ages Series.
It can be crafted at any crafting forge and requires the steel smithing perk. 
The stats make it roughly on par with the Glass Shield. It is in the light armour class with slightly more protection at the cost of slightly more weight.

Stats:
Base Armour Rating: 30
Weight: 8

Also find my viking spawn axe here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14066
author: Kizbot
